title: Tom Brady, Todd Gurley, NBA, and the Patriots
itunes:title: Tom Brady, Todd Gurley, NBA, and the Patriots
description:
Colin discusses the details of Tom Brady's contract with the Buccaneers, what probably went on behind the scenes between Todd Gurley and the Rams, what might happen to this NBA season, and more proof the Patriots could have kept Brady. Guests include Mike Sando, Phil Simms, Ric Bucher, and Geoff Schwartz.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
